title: Adobe Dashboard Guide: Logging into Adobe Dashboard/Local Apps with Okta SSO
content: This guide covers the generic Adobe sign-in page which provides access to all your assigned Adobe applications. However, for a more streamlined experience, logging in directly to the specific Adobe app is often recommended, especially if you primarily use only one. Most Adobe applications can be accessed directly via their dedicated Adobe domain http://acrobat.adobe.com Did you know there is an Okta icon in your Chrome toolbar that provides quick and easy access to all your apps? If you don't see it, simply click the puzzle piece icon and then select the pin next to the Okta Browser plugin. This will allow you to log in to your account swiftly and access all your apps with ease!
